ui.confirmReset: Are you sure you want to reset the game?
ui.clickToMove: Click on a highlighted tile to move

errors.noName: Enter a name for the player!
errors.characterInUse: This character is already in use!
errors.initError: Error initializing the game. Please reload the page.

hunter.name: Hunter
hunter.description: Specialist in tracking and ranged attacks. Knows well the dark lands and their creatures.

mystic.name: Mystic
mystic.description: Master of arcane arts, capable of manipulating the energies of the dark world.

guardian.name: Guardian
guardian.description: Tireless protector, with great resistance and ability to defend allies.

shadow.name: Shadow
shadow.description: Master of stealth, moves quickly and attacks by surprise.

healer.name: Healer
healer.description: Knowledgeable in healing arts, capable of restoring the life of companions.

berserker.name: Berserker
berserker.description: Fierce warrior who channels fury into devastating combat.

arthur.name: Arthur
arthur.description: Versatile and intelligent adventurer, with skills in technology and geography.

max_health.name: Max Health
max_health.description: Maximum amount of health points the character can have.

movement.name: Movement
movement.description: Number of tiles the character can move per turn.

tracking.name: Tracking
tracking.description: Ability to identify trails and detect hidden enemies. Each level increases detection range.

precision.name: Precision
precision.description: Improves hit chance on ranged attacks. Each level adds damage bonus.

arcane_power.name: Arcane Power
arcane_power.description: Intensity of offensive spells. Each level increases magic damage.

mana_pool.name: Mana Pool
mana_pool.description: Amount of magical energy available for casting spells.

armor.name: Armor
armor.description: Physical damage reduction. Each level reduces more damage.

shield_block.name: Shield Block
shield_block.description: Chance to completely block an attack. Each level increases the chance.

stealth.name: Stealth
stealth.description: Ability to move without being detected. Each level makes detection harder.

critical_strike.name: Critical Strike
critical_strike.description: Extra damage on surprise attacks. Each level increases the damage multiplier.

healing_power.name: Healing Power
healing_power.description: Amount of health restored by healing abilities. Each level increases healing.

purification.name: Purification
purification.description: Number of negative effects that can be removed per turn.

tecnologia.name: Technology
tecnologia.description: Knowledge of technological equipment. Reduces rounds to mount tech items.

geografia.name: Geography
geografia.description: Knowledge of terrain and navigation. Reduces rounds to mount navigation items.

inteligencia.name: Intelligence
inteligencia.description: Intellectual capacity and reasoning. Reduces rounds to mount complex items.

percepcao.name: Perception
percepcao.description: Observation capacity and attention to details. Increases efficiency in observation tasks.

rage.name: Rage
rage.description: Damage bonus when health is low. Each level increases the bonus.

brutal_strength.name: Brutal Strength
brutal_strength.description: Base damage on melee attacks. Each level increases damage.

hunter_mark.name: Hunter's Mark
hunter_mark.description: Marks an enemy. All attacks against it deal extra damage for 2 turns.

eagle_eye.name: Eagle Eye
eagle_eye.description: Can see through obstacles and detect enemies in a larger radius.

mystic_barrier.name: Mystic Barrier
mystic_barrier.description: Creates a protective barrier that absorbs the next damage received.

arcane_sight.name: Arcane Sight
arcane_sight.description: Can detect magic and magical items in adjacent tiles.

protective_aura.name: Protective Aura
protective_aura.description: Adjacent allies take half damage for 1 turn.

iron_will.name: Iron Will
iron_will.description: Immune to fear and mind control effects.

vanish.name: Vanish
vanish.description: Becomes invisible until the next attack or end of turn.

backstab.name: Backstab
backstab.description: Attacks against enemies that haven't detected you deal double damage.

divine_light.name: Divine Light
divine_light.description: Heals all allies in adjacent tiles for 3 health points.

healing_touch.name: Healing Touch
healing_touch.description: At the end of each turn, restores 1 health to an adjacent ally.

bloodlust.name: Bloodlust
bloodlust.description: For 2 turns, each attack that deals damage restores 1 health.

berserker_rage.name: Berserker Rage
berserker_rage.description: When health drops below 50%, gains an extra attack per turn.

quick_thinking.name: Quick Thinking
quick_thinking.description: Once per turn, can reroll an intelligence check.

resourceful.name: Resourceful
resourceful.description: Mounted items last one extra round before breaking.

tracking.title: Track
tracking.cannotTrack: You can only Track at a location (not on paths)
tracking.mustBeInLocation: You need to be at a location to Track

verde_2.name: Medicinal Herbs
verde_2.description: Can be used to heal 2 health or remove poison

amarelo_1.name: Protection Amulet
amarelo_1.description: Reduces next damage taken by half

amarelo_2.name: Energy Crystal
amarelo_2.description: Restores one use of special ability

russo_1.name: Mystical Vodka
russo_1.description: Gain +3 to all attributes for 2 turns

russo_2.name: Cursed Matryoshka
russo_2.description: Temporarily clone yourself, gaining an extra action

personagem_1.name: Mysterious Ally
personagem_1.description: A new character permanently joins the group

personagem_2.name: Guardian Spirit
personagem_2.description: Summons a guardian that fights by your side for 3 turns

verde_bicicleta.name: Bicycle
verde_bicicleta.description: Consumes on use. Requires Intelligence to mount. When used, player moves +12 meters.

verde_taco_pregr.name: Spiked Baseball Bat
verde_taco_pregr.description: Weapon (does not consume on use). Requires Intelligence to mount. Damage 8.

verde_barco.name: Boat
verde_barco.description: Does not consume. Requires Money/Intelligence to mount. Allows all players to go to the Lake.

verde_computador.name: Computer
verde_computador.description: Consumes on use. Requires Technology/Money to mount. Unlocks an already revealed location.

verde_internet.name: Internet
verde_internet.description: Consumes on use. Requires Technology. Reveals all hidden Russian and American soldiers in the real world (mechanic to be added later).

verde_walkie.name: Walkie Talkie
verde_walkie.description: Consumes on use. Requires Technology. Teleports you to a location that contains another player with a Walkie Talkie.

verde_medkit.name: Med Kit
verde_medkit.description: Consumes on use. Requires Intelligence. Fully restores the character's health.

verde_raspadinha.name: Cherry Scratchcard
verde_raspadinha.description: Consumes on use. Requires Money. Restores 3 health.

verde_pilha.name: Battery
verde_pilha.description: Consumes on use. Requires Money. Used together with a flashlight to exit the inverted world.

verde_lanca_fogo.name: Flame-tipped Spear
verde_lanca_fogo.description: Weapon. Requires Intelligence to mount. Damage 10.

verde_pisca_pisca.name: String Lights
verde_pisca_pisca.description: Consumes on use. Requires Technology/Money. Forces enemies to reveal all hidden cards at your location (only hidden cards in the real world).

verde_walkman.name: Walkman
verde_walkman.description: Consumes on use. Requires Technology. Removes possession from a player.

verde_mapa.name: Map
verde_mapa.description: Consumes on use. Requires Geography. Keeps a tunnel revealed to enemies until the map is destroyed or discarded.

verde_fosforo.name: Match
verde_fosforo.description: Consumes on use. Requires Money. Must be used with gasoline to burn tunnels or other targets.
